dcterms:creator: Y. Yang
S. Newsam
dcterms:description: The UC Merced Land Use dataset consists of 2100 aerial optical images, each labeled as belonging to one of 21 land use classes, with 100 images per class. The images are 256x256 pixels in size and have a resolution of 30 cm.
dcterms:title: UC Merced Land Use Dataset

dcterms:creator: O.A.B. Penatti
K. Nogueira
J.A. dos Santos
dcterms:description: The Brazilian Coffee Scenes dataset includes satellite images taken by the SPOT sensor, partitioned into over 50,000 labeled tiles (64x64 pixels) categorized as coffee, non-coffee, or mixed. It is designed to study the classification of coffee scenes.
dcterms:title: Brazilian Coffee Scenes Dataset
